formalpara.title: Figure 2. Pharynx anatomy.
formalpara.para: The pharynx is composed of eight layers of muscles (pm1-8, green) separated by structural marginal cells (mc1-3, pink). These are arranged with three-fold rotational symmetry, as shown in the cross section. Kindly reproduced with permission from Z.F. Altun & D.H. Hall's Alimentary System in WormAtlas. Right-click or control click for high resolution image.
